name: 1 - Location of facilities within areas given in MRTS 28.1 Cl. 1 or through private arrangements.
2 - Properly constructed toilets, rubbish receptacles and wash facilities provided.
3 - Camp and facilities provide safe egress and ingress and do not impact on existing through traffic.
4 - If no area's are included in Cl6 MRTS 28.1 the contractor shall be responsible for obtaining any necessary area's for the establishment of a camp.
5 - Contractors camp complies with all requirements of MRTS28 annexure with a proposed site facilty layout submitted to the administrator.
